data.title: Remove The Silent E's
data.solution:
conversions = { "a" => "ei", "e" => "i:", "i" => "ai",
  "o" => "eu", "u" => "yu:"}

word = gets.chomp

vowel = /[aeiou]/
consonant = /[^aeiou]/
pattern = /(#{vowel})(#{consonant})e$/

phonetic_word = word.sub( pattern ){ conversions[$1] + $2 }

puts phonetic_word
data.statement:
Your friend is learning English and can't understand silent {{e}}'s in words. To help them you decide to write some code to transform all silent {{e}}'s to a more phonetic spelling.

Given a lower case [[word]] with a silent {{e}} at the end, print the word after transforming it using the following rules:

({{*}} means any number of preceding letters and {{C}} means a consonant, i.e. letters other than {{aeiou}})

{{*aCe}} is transformed to {{*eiC}} (e.g. fade → feid)
{{*eCe}} is transformed to {{*i:C}} (e.g. theme → thi:m)
{{*iCe}} is transformed to {{*aiC}} (e.g. size → saiz)
{{*oCe}} is transformed to {{*euC}} (e.g. phone → pheun)
{{*uCe}} is transformed to {{*yu:C}} (e.g. compute → compyu:t)

The silent {{e}} is only the final {{e}}, so don't transform earlier parts of the word even if they match the same patterns (e.g. telephone → telepheun, not ti:lpheun)

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Your friend is learning English and can't understand silent e's in words. To help them you decide to write some code to transform all silent e's to a more phonetic spelling.

Given a lower case word with a silent e at the end, print the word after transforming it using the following rules:

(* means any number of preceding letters and C means a consonant, i.e. letters other than aeiou)

*aCe is transformed to *eiC (e.g. fade → feid)
*eCe is transformed to *i:C (e.g. theme → thi:m)
*iCe is transformed to *aiC (e.g. size → saiz)
*oCe is transformed to *euC (e.g. phone → pheun)
*uCe is transformed to *yu:C (e.g. compute → compyu:t)

The silent e is only the final e, so don't transform earlier parts of the word even if they match the same patterns (e.g. telephone → telepheun, not ti:lpheun)
Input
1 line: a word with a silent e at the end
Output
1 line: the word spelt phonetically, using the transformation rules
Constraints
All words will follow one of the transformation rules.
3 < length of word < 25
All words are made of lowercase English letters (a-z)
Example
Input
bake
Output
beik
